name: Global Summit on Quantum, Atomic and Molecular Physics
content: The Apex global meetings takes the pleasure to invite you to the “Global Summit on Quantum, Atomic and Molecular Physics”( GSQAMP2024) November 14-16, 2024 at Dubai, UAE. The theme of the conference is “Moving To Master Physics Atomic Level which focuses on advancements and strategies for better research outcomes.GSQAMP2024 is an annual meeting organized with the intend of being a platform for Atom and Molecular physics experts, Researchers, academicians as well as industrial experts from all over the world to present their research results and development activities in Atom and Molecular physics.

full: United Arb Emirates United Arab Emirates
